name: Deep Diver
description:
Dive as deep as you can, but don't run out of oxygen. Below 65m is a good score.

Use left and right to catch the bubbles - but remember to save some for the way up.

Your depth only counts if you reach the surface alive.

Ascend with up key - you can only change direction once.

Made as a practice for the 1 hour game jam.  Subject was "submerged".

Took me about 90 minutes in the end - I'm still learning unity so have to look lots of things up!
